deprecated::basic_colvec

deprecated::basic_colvec< eT > Class Template Reference

Class name 'basic_colvec' is deprecated. 'basic_colvec' has been defined as 'Col' for compatibility with Armadillo <= 0.6.2. More...

#include <deprecated.hpp>

Detailed Description

template<typename eT>
class deprecated::basic_colvec< eT >

Class name 'basic_colvec' is deprecated. 'basic_colvec' has been defined as 'Col' for compatibility with Armadillo <= 0.6.2.
